data: ECHO-GL Liu et al. (2024a)
Tùi îng-li̍k hōe-gī chu-liāu ê ī-chit tô͘-hêng ha̍k-si̍p
Siang ki-chè hong-hoat, kiat-ha̍p khong-kan koan-hē kap kó͘-phiò tōng-thài
MGDPR You et al. (2024)
Thàu-kòe chu-sìn sún-sit lâi chò tōng-thài koan-hē bô͘-hêng
To-koan-hē khok-sàn kòe-têng, pēng-iûⁿ liû-chûn
Tī NASDAQ, NYSE, Siōng-hái chi-kan it-tì ê chhiau-chhut piáu-hiān (2016-2023)
LARA Zeng et al. (2024)
Jī-kai-tōaⁿ khì-chiau kò͘-kè, iû-kî kám-tiu̍t tē-hng ê chù-ì-le̍k
Têng-ho̍k chhim-hòa piau-chhiam, iōng-lâi kiám-chió chhau-im
Cheng-tō͘: 59.1% Tī put-ún-tēng chhī-tiûⁿ tiong kái-siān ê iâⁿ-su pí-lu̍t
MANA-Net Wang and Ma (2024)
Tōng-thài chhī-tiûⁿ sin-bûn chù-ì-le̍k ki-chè
Khó-hùn-liān ê chêng-sū chi̍p-ha̍p, ūi-tio̍h ū-chhek chòe-ka-hòa
SH-Mix Jain et al. (2024)
Chân-chhù-sek to-bô͘-thài cheng-kiông chhek-lio̍k
Bô͘-thài choan-iōng kap khu-kan-sek hūn-ha̍p ki-su̍t
Piáu-hiān kái-siān: 3-7% tī kok-chióng jīm-bū chi-kan
SEP Koa et al. (2024a)
Chū-hoán-siā ê LLM kò͘-kè, iōng-lâi chū-chú ha̍k-si̍p
Saⁿ-kai-tōaⁿ liû-chêng, iû PPO chòe-ka-hòa
Tī ū-chhek kap kái-sek phín-chit nn̄g hong-bīn lóng ū chòe-ko ê piáu-hiān
